title: Animal behaviour
creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, Chris O'Rourke and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: Stewart Jackel, senior education officer of Zoo Education Services, and Year 12 students from Prahran High School discuss the adaptive nature of animal behaviour and the ways in which animal structures are used to assist survival.
